Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Eiferer

Ruhsiber kuzgun, +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Gözetmen, {g|f:7f6f5b934a994383b8490c76fd5023d4}Tahtın Işığı{/g} kabiliyetini kazanır.

Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Zélote.
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +25.
Le surveillant gagne la capacité {g|f:7f6f5b934a994383b8490c76fd5023d4}Lumière du trône{/g}.
